p: Immunodominance is an intriguing phenomenon from a basic biological standpoint and is also considered an obstacle to successful vaccination [ 32]. Bona fide T CD8 responses must be both sufficient in vigor and broad in scope to optimally target multiple peptide Ags. An immunodominant status does not necessarily confer a protective property upon any given T cell clone(s) [ 33] as subdominant T CD8 responses can also contribute to anti-pathogen immunity.
